Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A pair of ankles. {? | $(this.combat:injury:ankle) | They have $(this.combat:injury:ankle).}
A pair of armpits. {? | $(this.combat:injury:armpit) | They have $(this.combat:injury:armpit).}
A pair of arms. {? | $(this.combat:injury:arm) | They have $(this.combat:injury:arm).}
The body, either considered as the complete person, or the person without their limbs. {? | $(this.combat:injury:body) | It has $(this.combat:injury:body).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A pair of cheeks.|A pair of $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheeks.}
The bone across the upper front of the body, connecting the breastbone to the shoulders.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobes.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) ears.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A pair of eyebrows.|A pair of $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrows.}
A finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a finger.
Ten fingernails, at the ends of the fingers.
A set of fingers, with nails at the ends.

{? equal | $(this.appearance:furlength) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:furlength) }{? equal | $(this.appearance:furtexture) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:furtexture) }{? equal | $(this.appearance:furcolor) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:furcolor) }$(this.appearance:furtype).
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A pair of hands.|A pair of $(this.appearance:hands) hands.}
The jugular veins, running along the neck.
The arms and legs, together with their hands, feet, elbows, knees, etc..
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |A lower lip.| lower lip.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |An upper lip.| upper lip.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |A pair of lips.|A pair of $(this.appearance:lipshape) lips.}
The contractile tissue which produces movement in the human body.
A pair of nostrils, on a nose.
The little fingers of the hands, with nails at the ends.
The little finger on a hand, with a nail at the end.
The triangular bones across the upper back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
The side, between the ribs and the waist.
The sides, between the ribs and the waist.
A temple, to one side of the forehead.
A pair of temples, on either side of the forehead.
A toenail, at the end of a toe.
Ten toenails, at the ends of the toes.
A wound of $(this.trait:woundname) import{? equal | $(this.trait:wound-count) | 3 |, requiring the immediate attention of a Healer}.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "set this.zcnt to 1 :: set this.zdata to \$lookup(Generic:DB:UrPeople:data) :: set this.zmax to \$obj(this.zdata).scripts"

"set this.zlist to script\$prop(this.zcnt) :: set this.zcode to \$list(this.zdata,\$prop(this.zlist),1) :: set this.zcode to \$lookup(\$prop(this.zcode)) :: set this.zscript to \$list(this.zdata,\$prop(this.zlist),2) :: set this.bilbo:inherit:\$prop(this.zscript) to \$prop(this.zcode)"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:browshape) = nil then set this.appearance:browshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:build) = nil then set this.appearance:build to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:cheekshape) = nil then set this.appearance:cheekshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:earshape) = nil then set this.appearance:earshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) = nil then set this.appearance:eyebrowshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyecolor) = nil then set this.appearance:eyecolor to black"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyeshape) = nil then set this.appearance:eyeshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:facialhair) = nil then set this.appearance:facialhair to none"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:faciallength) = nil then set this.appearance:faciallength to trim"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:haircolor) = nil then set this.appearance:haircolor to raven"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:haircoverage) = nil then set this.appearance:haircoverage to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairlength) = nil then set this.appearance:hairlength to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairstyle) = nil then set this.appearance:hairstyle to uncombed"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairtype) = nil then set this.appearance:hairtype to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hands) = nil then set this.appearance:hands to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:height) = nil then set this.appearance:height to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:jawshape) = nil then set this.appearance:jawshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:lipshape) = nil then set this.appearance:lipshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:mouthshape) = nil then set this.appearance:mouthshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:skin) = nil then set this.appearance:skin to fair"
"set this.zlist to nil :: set this.zdata to nil :: set this.zscript to nil :: set this.zcode to nil :: set this.zcnt to nil :: set this.zmax to nil :: call bilbo:react:exitsub"
"set this.zcnt to 1 :: set this.zdata to \$lookup(Generic:DB:UrPeople:data) :: set this.zmax to \$obj(this.zdata).scripts"

"set this.zlist to script\$prop(this.zcnt) :: set this.zcode to \$list(this.zdata,\$prop(this.zlist),1) :: set this.zcode to \$lookup(\$prop(this.zcode)) :: set this.zscript to \$list(this.zdata,\$prop(this.zlist),2) :: set this.bilbo:inherit:\$prop(this.zscript) to \$prop(this.zcode)"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:browshape) = nil then set this.appearance:browshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:build) = nil then set this.appearance:build to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:cheekshape) = nil then set this.appearance:cheekshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:earshape) = nil then set this.appearance:earshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) = nil then set this.appearance:eyebrowshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyecolor) = nil then set this.appearance:eyecolor to black"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:eyeshape) = nil then set this.appearance:eyeshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:facialhair) = nil then set this.appearance:facialhair to none"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:faciallength) = nil then set this.appearance:faciallength to trim"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:haircolor) = nil then set this.appearance:haircolor to raven"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:haircoverage) = nil then set this.appearance:haircoverage to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairlength) = nil then set this.appearance:hairlength to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairstyle) = nil then set this.appearance:hairstyle to uncombed"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hairtype) = nil then set this.appearance:hairtype to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:hands) = nil then set this.appearance:hands to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:height) = nil then set this.appearance:height to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:jawshape) = nil then set this.appearance:jawshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:lipshape) = nil then set this.appearance:lipshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:mouthshape) = nil then set this.appearance:mouthshape to ordinary"
"if \$prop(this.appearance:skin) = nil then set this.appearance:skin to fair"
"set this.zlist to nil :: set this.zdata to nil :: set this.zscript to nil :: set this.zcode to nil :: set this.zcnt to nil :: set this.zmax to nil :: call bilbo:react:exitsub"
X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "CALLING"); Call(\$\{Allegory:Lib:UrPeople:Description\}, "updatedesc", \$body: this); EmitTo(\$actor, "SNIFFING"); return TRUE;
